attributes.action: stop bringing in more onerous rules and regulations on private landlords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Contrary to popular opinion, private landlords don't make very much money from property rents and in most cases only keep them for their rising value. If the Government keeps bringing in more regulations, as soon as property prices stop rising many landlords will sell up possibly creating a property crash. Most landlords do a very good job under difficult circumstances, it's the non rent paying, property trashing tenants that need sorting out.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with the an existing petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Norentpaid/ Please consider signing this before re-submitting.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
